name: Dark Materialized Google Voice June 2019
description: Google voice thats easy on the eyes
additional_info:
Changelog:

10-22-19: Updated top bar again!




9-9-2019:
Been awhile for awhile to let google cool down with the constant changes lol. Back with a newer cleaner interface




6-27-19:
-Fix Header Content - Again! 
-Adjusted some background shadows and text alignment



6-20-19.5:
-Fixed Content shift to left side

6-20-19:
-Fixed Header again....Damn you google!



6-6-2019: 
-Fixed top google voice bar colors as they reverted back, potentially due to google updated the elements.

-Added line through Voice text

-Replaced voice logo for google assistant icon as the default one is boring




05-30-2019:

Start.

-Changed chat bubbles to gradient and added elevation to mimic 3D effect

-Changed svg icons to have elevation effect for 3D effect

-Changed google search bar to give more depth and blend with the theme

-Hid the scrollbars as they are not necessary and look tacky af

-and more...

discussions.name: This is the only style here that works with the current Google Voice layout.
Add this to the style for further usability:
